Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.audio.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Works through a Singleton Design Pattern Centralized audio manager for the Tetris game. Handles background music and sound effects with volume control.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    dispose()
    Releases all resources held by the AudioManager, stopping all music and disposing of MediaPlayer instances to prevent resource leaks.
    static AudioManager
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the AudioManager.
    double
    getMusicVolume()
    Retrieves the current global volume setting for background music.

    Retrieves the current global volume setting for sound effects.

    Checks if background music is currently enabled.
    boolean
    isSfxEnabled()
    Checks if sound effects are currently enabled.
    void
    pauseMusic()
    Pauses the currently playing background music.
    void

    Stops any currently playing music and starts playing the game background music.

    Stops any currently playing music and starts playing the menu background music.

    Plays a specified sound effect.

    Resumes the previously paused background music, if music is enabled.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AudioManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the AudioManager. If the instance does not exist, it will be created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of AudioManager.

    • playMenuMusic

      public void playMenuMusic()
      Stops any currently playing music and starts playing the menu background music. Music will only play if music is enabled in the settings.

    • playGameMusic

      public void playGameMusic()
      Stops any currently playing music and starts playing the game background music. Music will only play if music is enabled in the settings.

    • stopAllMusic

      public void stopAllMusic()
      Stops all currently playing background music. Resets the current music state to NONE.

    • pauseMusic

      public void pauseMusic()
      Pauses the currently playing background music. The music can be resumed later from where it left off.

    • resumeMusic

      public void resumeMusic()
      Resumes the previously paused background music, if music is enabled.

    • playSound

      public void playSound(SoundEffect effect)
      Plays a specified sound effect. The sound effect will only play if sound effects are enabled in the settings. Each sound effect is reset to the beginning before playing.
      Parameters:
      effect - The SoundEffect enum representing the sound to play.

    • setMusicVolume

      public void setMusicVolume(double volume)
      Sets the global volume for all background music. The volume is clamped between 0.0 and 1.0.
      Parameters:
      volume - The desired music volume (0.0 to 1.0).

    • setSfxVolume

      public void setSfxVolume(double volume)
      Sets the global volume for all sound effects. The volume is clamped between 0.0 and 1.0.
      Parameters:
      volume - The desired sound effects volume (0.0 to 1.0).

    • getMusicVolume

      public double getMusicVolume()
      Retrieves the current global volume setting for background music.
      Returns:
      The current music volume (0.0 to 1.0).

    • getSfxVolume

      public double getSfxVolume()
      Retrieves the current global volume setting for sound effects.
      Returns:
      The current sound effects volume (0.0 to 1.0).

    • setMusicEnabled

      public void setMusicEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables all background music. If music is disabled, any playing music will be stopped. If re-enabled, previously playing music will resume.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True to enable music, false to disable.

    • setSfxEnabled

      public void setSfxEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables all sound effects.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True to enable sound effects, false to disable.

    • isMusicEnabled

      public boolean isMusicEnabled()
      Checks if background music is currently enabled.
      Returns:
      True if music is enabled, false otherwise.

    • isSfxEnabled

      public boolean isSfxEnabled()
      Checks if sound effects are currently enabled.
      Returns:
      True if sound effects are enabled, false otherwise.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Releases all resources held by the AudioManager, stopping all music and disposing of MediaPlayer instances to prevent resource leaks.
